component.name: Reclone GUI
component.summary: A cross-platform GUI for rclone cloud storage management

description.p: Reclone GUI is a modern desktop application that provides a graphical interface for rclone, the powerful command-line cloud storage manager. It supports sync, copy, move, and check operations across all rclone-supported cloud providers including Google Drive, Dropbox, S3, and many more.

ul.li: Browse remote files with a dual-pane file manager
Sync, copy, move, and check between any configured remotes
Advanced transfer options: bandwidth limits, filters, dry-run mode
Multi-transfer support with real-time progress tracking
Context menu for quick actions (new folder, delete, copy/move/sync to)

description.p: First full-featured release with GUI sync operations.

ul.li: Advanced options: bandwidth, filters, dry-run, checksum
Multi-transfer progress tracking with cancel support
Right-click context menus for file operations
